A French intelligence report says Osama had died of typhoid fever in Pakistan.
 
 Though the veracity of the report cannot be ascertained at this early date, it is safe to speculate that, if true, OBL is now comfortably resting in a seaside villa in paradise after knocking down two more virgins last night. Peeled grapes and chilled French wine are awaiting his recuperative rest. Virgins, though highly over-rated on earth, are proving to be quite the strenuous and invigorating workout for the religious leader.
